summary: An executive and a dowdy working-class woman, both unemployed, married and parents meet at a supermarket. They become friends but find it hard to accept that they may be in love with each other.
cast: Valeria Bruni Tedeschi|Patrick Dell'Isola|Sergi López|Florence Thomassin|Kelly Hornoy|Marion des Fachelles|Jérémy Bourgois|Chloé Mons|Alexandre Carrière|Farida Rahouadj|Josette Hemsen|Philippe Peltier|Frédérique Hazard|Jo Hochain|Sarah Hamoud|Mathilde Braure|Marianne Wolfson|Pierre-Louis Lanier|Rachid Bouali|Annette Lowcay|Alexandre Jouglet|Witold Heretynski|Alain Rozanès|Marco Cherqui|Antoine Mathieu|Dodine Herry|Éric Caravaca|Frédéric Martin|Daniel Morin|Miguel Muniz|Frédérique Ruvez
title: Rien à faire
